info.title: CHIPS Point of Sale: Token Based Payment API
info.description:
The CHIPS Payment Network enables registered merchants to create payment request tokens at their till points and point of sales devices. These token can be displayed as QRs which can action payment with various MasterPass enabled payment applications available on the South African payments landscape, for example CHIPS® Money Manager, Zapper, SnapScan and any Masterpass™ compliant banking app.

# Overview
The below diagram depicts the process flow of a token based payment. 

![Point of Sale: Token Based Payment Proccess Flow](https://marketplace.trustlinkhosting.com/images/Providers/CHIPS/POSTokenBasedPayment-ProcessFlow.png)

For more details see 
* [business flow description]
* [API example flow]
* [API environments](Environments) 

# More info
For more info on CHIPS® and the Trustlink API Marplace se see:
* [CHIPS home page](https://chips.co.za)
* [CHIPS for businesses](https://www.chips.co.za/payment-network/index.php/businesses)


# Getting Started
* Register on the [Trustlink API Marketplace](https://marketplace.trustlinkhosting.com/component/apiportal/registration)
* Send an email requesting access to the CHIPS Point of Sale: Token Based Payment API to apisales@trustlink.co.za

# Terms and Conditions
By using these APIs you agree to the following terms and conditions
1. [CHIPS Terms and Conditions](http://www.chips.co.za/downloads/CHIPS_Terms_Conditions_2019-07-25.pdf)
1. [AOS Terms and Conditions](http://www.chips.co.za/downloads/AOS_Terms_and_Conditions_2018-06-26.pdf)

parameters.description: Created from date and time (ISO8601 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.nnnZ)
parameters.name: createdFrom

parameters.description: Created until date and time (ISO8601 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.nnnZ)
parameters.name: createdUntil

parameters.description: Number of entries to include per page
parameters.name: size

lastModified.description: Date and time last modified (ISO8601 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.nnnZ)

get.summary: Get one or more payment requests

amount.description:
Amount in to generate the QR code for. The amount will be displayed to the scanner of the QR code in order for them to confirm.
If omitted, the QR scanner can populate their own amount. Format R.cc / R

description.description: Description for the transaction. This will be displayed to the scanner of the QR code.

expiryTime.description: Expiry date and time (ISO8601 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.nnnZ). After this time scanning the QR will result in an invalid QR response.

lastModified.description: Date and time last modified (ISO8601 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.nnnZ)

post.description:
Generate a CHIPS MasterPass token.

View in [Stoplight](https://stoplight.io/p/docs/gh/trustlink-apim/chips/sandbox-chips-payments-masterpass/swagger.json/paths/~1tokens/post)

Merchant Device API Key Authentication.description:
The CHIPS Payment Request APIs require Basic Authentication using the merchantUUID and the deviceAPIKey. Thus the Authorization header should contain a base64 encoded concatenation of merchantUUID, colon and deviceAPIKey.
[More details](https://marketplace.trustlinkhosting.com/chips-merchant-device-auth)
